item.title: Orissa Minerals Joins Hidden Turnarounds List Amid Strong Quarterly Financials
item.description: Orissa Minerals, a small-cap player in the Minerals & Mining sector, has been added to the Hidden Turnarounds list as of 22 December 2025, reflecting its recent positive financial trajectory and potential for sustained growth. The company’s latest quarterly results reveal notable improvements in profitability and operational efficiency, positioning it as a compelling candidate for investors seeking emerging turnaround opportunities. Time: 17 minutes ago

item.title: Are G V Films latest results good or bad?
item.description: G V Films' latest results are concerning, showing a 62.5% decline in net sales to ₹0.30 crores and a net loss of ₹0.05 crores, indicating ongoing operational and financial challenges, with significant accumulated losses and a lack of investor confidence. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Medi Assist Healthcare Services Forms Death Cross Signalling Potential Bearish Trend
item.description: Medi Assist Healthcare Services, a small-cap player in the insurance sector, has recently formed a Death Cross, a technical pattern where the 50-day moving average crosses below the 200-day moving average. This development often signals a shift towards a bearish trend and suggests a weakening momentum in the stock’s price action over the longer term. Time: 2 hours ago
